title: Ducha Clean
detail: A smart shower head that revolutionizes the showering experience.
extended_details: A unique shower head attachment that slightly heats up the water before it exits. The showerhead will also feature LED lights that will make it appear as though the water has changed color and a speaker that can play music while a person is showering. The led lights can help indicate water temperature and shower time.  Also, some energy will be gathered from the flow of the water and the temperature difference between the air and water. However, we plan to have a backup USB input for charging.
